instructions.zh: 翻译 'translation' 字段，保留 'variables' 中列出的变量不翻译
instructions.en: Translate the 'translation' field, keep variables listed in 'variables' unchanged

texts.original: [moving_human] screams out in pain as \the [src] moves across their eyes!
texts.context:
161: 		//ouch!
162: 		INVOKE_ASYNC(moving_human, /mob/proc/emote, "pain")
163: 		visible_message(SPAN_DANGER("[moving_human] screams out in pain as \the [src] moves across their eyes!"), SPAN_NOTICE("Aurgh!!! \The [src] moves across your unprotected eyes for a split-second!"))
164: 	else
165: 		if(HAS_TRAIT(moving_human, TRAIT_BIMEX))
texts.translation: 当\the [src]扫过[moving_human]的眼睛时，[moving_human]痛苦地尖叫起来！

texts.original: [moving_human]'s BiMex© personal shades shine as \the [src] passes over them.

167: 		else
168: 			visible_message(SPAN_NOTICE("[moving_human]'s headgear protects them from \the [src]."), SPAN_NOTICE("Your headgear protects you from  \the [src]."))
texts.translation: 当\the [src]扫过时，[moving_human]的BiMex©个人墨镜闪烁着光芒。

texts.original: The [title] browser you tried to open failed a sanity check! Please report this on github!
texts.context:
134: /datum/browser/proc/open(use_onclose = TRUE)
135: 	if(isnull(window_id)) //null check because this can potentially nuke goonchat
136: 		to_chat(user, SPAN_USERDANGER("The [title] browser you tried to open failed a sanity check! Please report this on github!"))
137: 		return
138: 	var/window_size = ""
texts.translation: 您尝试打开的[title]浏览器未能通过完整性检查！请在GitHub上报告此问题！

texts.original: Unable to create a bug report at this time, please create the issue directly through our GitHub repository instead
texts.context:
25: 
26: /datum/tgui_bug_report_form/proc/external_link_prompt(client/user)
27: 	tgui_alert(user, "Unable to create a bug report at this time, please create the issue directly through our GitHub repository instead")
28: 	var/url = CONFIG_GET(string/githuburl)
29: 	if(!url)
texts.translation: 目前无法创建错误报告，请直接通过我们的GitHub仓库创建问题

texts.original: The configuration is not properly set, unable to open external link.
texts.context:
28: 	var/url = CONFIG_GET(string/githuburl)
29: 	if(!url)
30: 		to_chat(user, SPAN_WARNING("The configuration is not properly set, unable to open external link."))
31: 		return
32:
texts.translation: 配置未正确设置，无法打开外部链接。

texts.original: This will open the GitHub in your browser. Are you sure?
texts.context:
31: 		return
32: 
33: 	if(tgui_alert(user, "This will open the GitHub in your browser. Are you sure?", "Confirm", list("Yes", "No")) == "Yes")

35:
texts.translation: 这将在您的浏览器中打开GitHub。确定吗？

texts.original: Unable to identify the author of the bug report.

texts.translation: 另一位管理员当前正在访问此报告，请等待他们完成后再进行任何更改。

texts.original: An admin has successfully submitted your report and it should now be visible on GitHub. Thanks again!
texts.context:
151: 	else
152: 		message_admins("[user.ckey] has approved a bug report from [initial_key] titled [bug_report_data["title"]] at [time2text(world.timeofday, "YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss")].")
153: 		to_chat(initial_user, SPAN_WARNING("An admin has successfully submitted your report and it should now be visible on GitHub. Thanks again!"))
154: 	qdel(src)// approved and submitted, we no longer need the datum.

texts.translation: 管理员已成功提交您的报告，现在应该在GitHub上可见。再次感谢！

texts.original: Your bug report has been submitted, thank you!

texts.translation: 你的错误报告已提交，谢谢！

texts.original: you have already confirmed the submission, please wait a moment for the API to process your submission.

texts.original: An admin has rejected your bug report, this can happen for several reasons. They will most likely get back to you shortly regarding your issue.
texts.context:

texts.translation: 管理员已拒绝你的错误报告，原因可能有多方面。他们很可能很快就会就你的问题联系你。

texts.original: You just did an emote. Wait awhile.
